summary: A comprehensive suite of unit tests for AWS Systems Manager (SSM) utilities, covering parameter store CRUD operations, document management, maintenance windows, patch baselines, secrets manager integration, default AMI retrieval, CloudFormation interactions, and related helper functions, all using mocked AWS services.
business_intent: Provide automated verification of SSM-related functionality to ensure code correctness and reliability without requiring real AWS resources, facilitating safe development and continuous integration.
